issue.title: Add CSV Writer documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13230](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13230). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The new CSV writer in C+, Python and possibly other languages does not have much documentation. A user who checks out our site would probably still believe that we don't have an CSV writer in C+.
